EmailTemplate.name: RE: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners (1355159492.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners (1355159492.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Test - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Oliver, My name is Sara Conde, I will be your point of contact moving forward as Nicolette is out of the office today. I would love to set up a time to speak with you and see if accepting the corp. to corp. rate through MBO is the best option. You may call me directly or you may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Oliver Triunfo [mailto:oliver@olivertriunfo.com <mailto:oliver@olivertriunfo.com>] Sent: Sunday, December 09, 2012 7:13 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners Hello Nicolette, I am recently presented a six month contract opportunity for a W2 rate of $75/hour or corp-to-corp rate of $80/hour by a recruiter. I searched and found your website recommended on an Internet forum. I would like to know your service fees to ensure it make sense going with corp-to-corp rate using your service, versus accepting the W2 rate. I would also like to know how your service works and how long it takes to setup. Thank you!Cheers,Oliver Triunfo On Dec 9, 2012, at 5:07 PM, "Nicolette Taylor" <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Dear Oliver, Thank you for taking the time to contact MBO Partners. My name is Nicolette Taylor, an MBO Partners Enrollment Manager, and I will reach out to you within one business day. If you prefer, you can easily schedule a phone appointment with me by visiting https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK>. I look forward to speaking with you! Best regards,Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6281f: 703-793-6070e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MjAxODMmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUxMDkxMjcmZW1haWxpZD1vbGl2ZXJAb2xpdmVydHJpdW5mby5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTIwOTI2LTEzMzA4MjMtMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonu6XKZKXonjHpfsX56O8tUaW1lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATMBmI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>
